divs: sighting detailsi was driving on 74\23 heading west towards bryson city, and i saw something moving slowly and smoothly just above the tree line to my right, heading the opposite direction. i remember thinking that it was surveying something, but realized it wasn't something i hadn't seen before when i saw the green square lights underneath it. it went over my car, and i saw it for a minute looking up over my steering wheel through my windshield, and was so completely caught off-guard i did not stop. i tried looking in my rear view and side mirrors but did not see it again. it was a triangle, with i believe 4 square green lights on each side (could be more or less, but the green lights were definitely square). there were also red lights, but i don't remember them being of any significant shape. i was going appox. 60 mph, i was in the left lane and there was a car next to me. i was not going under a bridge and it did not look like a helicopter. i did not have time to turn my music down so i do not know if it was loud or quiet.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Sylva
There were no other sightings in Sylva on or around November 9th 2010
Summary: Triangular object with green square lights and smaller red lights
